cause.description:
The goal of the boycott is bring economic pressure to the Republic of Turkey by boycotting Turkish made goods and tourism to Turkey.
The boycott is initiated to compel the Republic of Turkey to clean up its Human Rights Record by ending:
* The denial of the Armenian Genocide * The denial of the Assyrian Genocide * The denial of the Greek Genocide * The occupation of Cyprus * The illegal blockade of Armenia * The suppression of the Kurds * The imprisonment of journalists * The suppression of freedom of speech * The destruction of Christian monuments * The torture of prisoners * And many others...
Also, to present alternatives to Turkish made goods and tourism to Turkey.
1. End the denial of the Armenian Genocide by Turkey
2. End the denial of the Assyrian Genocide by Turkey
3. End the denial of the Greek Genocide by Turkey
4. End the occupation of Cyprus by Turkey
5. End the illegal blockade of Armenia by Turkey
6. End the suppression of the Kurds by Turkey
7. End the imprisonment of journalists by Turkey
8. End the suppression of freedom of speech by Turkey
9. End the destruction of Christian monuments by Turkey
10. End the torture of prisoners in Turkey
